name: righty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who uses their right hand to write, etc.: My mother was a righty and was never happy that I used my left hand to write with. I'm usually a lefty but was taught to play tennis by a righty, so that's how I ended up playing tennis right-handed.
in the game of baseball, a player who pitches (= throws) the ball with their right hand : I find it much easier to hit homers from a righty. The righty's fastball was clocked at 86 mph, so fast but not that fast.
